comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
The Linux releases are available from https://packages.microsoft.com if you follow [these instructions](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/install/installing-powershell-core-on-linux). macOS is also published to Homebrew. Windows releases will eventually be published to the Microsoft Store (targeting Preview.6 for PS7). Is it primarily Windows that you are having an issue since typically you would need to download it from our Releases page?
